Member Function Documentation

virtual const Bitmap& sgfx::Font::bitmap ( ) const
pure virtual

This methods draws a character (c) on the font's bitmap and returns a pointer to the bitmap.

Parameters
cThe character to draw
asciitrue if c is an ascii character or false the font is an icon font
Returns
A pointer to a bitmap or zero if the character could not be loaded

Implemented in sgfx::FontMemory.

int sgfx::Font::calc_len ( const char *  str) const

Calulate the length (pixels on x-axis) of the specified string

static const char* sgfx::Font::charset ( )
static

Returns a string of the available character set

int sgfx::Font::draw_str ( const char *  str,
Bitmap &  dest,
sg_point_t  point 
) const

Set the string pixels in the bitmap

Parameters
strThe string to draw (or set)
bitmapThe bitmap to draw the string on
pointThe top left corner to start drawing the string
Returns
Zero on success
virtual sg_size_t sgfx::Font::get_height ( ) const
pure virtual

The maximum height of the font.

Implemented in sgfx::FontMemory.
